body:
Chapter 2552 - 2552 Chapter 2551-Stepping Into The Heavenly Emperor Stage

2552 Chapter 2551-stepping into the heavenly Emperor stage

Seeing that his sword attack had failed, sacred ancestor bloodheart was enraged. His divine power began to burn.

Although burning his Shen power like this was extremely taxing on him and would leave behind terrifying after-effects, he couldn’t care about it now!

As long as he could level the heaven realm and successfully split open the sky, the G.o.ds from beyond the heavens would definitely bestow him with treasures. His injuries and aftereffects were nothing.

He held a blood-red sword and slashed at the dark holy light cage.

BOOM! BOOM!

The dark holy light cage shook violently. Every time sacred ancestor bloodheart’s sword hit it, Xic nianqing and Xie nianjun’s delicate bodies would tremble and their faces would turn paler.

It was obvious that sacred ancestor bloodheart’s attack had also put a great burden on them.

But they gritted their teeth and persevered.

Now, it all depended on who could hold on. Whoever could hold on would be the winner.

“Break, Break, Break!”

Saint ancestor bloodheart attacked crazily, and she could unleash over a hundred strikes in an instant.

The two sides were in a stalemate.

However, Lu Ming was progressing smoothly.

He activated the doubling of his combat power, and his combat power skyrocketed. He kept bombarding the power of the heavenly Dao, breaking the restraints of the heavenly Dao into pieces.

In the end, the spear spun and swept across the sky, completely blasting away the power of the heavenly

Dao.

BOOM!

At that moment, the aura on Lu Ming’s body exploded and rose to its peak.

“Break!”

Lu Ming let out a long howl, his long hair flying in the wind. Then, a loud boom erupted from his body. He had broken through a bottleneck!

His realm had risen to a whole new level.

That was the heavenly Emperor realm!

At this moment, Lu Ming seemed to be able to control and dominate everything. The entire heaven realm was under his control. The battlefield of the sinkhole and the great battle in two world city were also under his perception.

“Has the final battle begun?”

Lu Ming’s eyes turned cold.

Previously, he had been cultivating with all his heart, trying to break through to the next realm. He had no other thoughts in his mind. He didn’t expect that the final battle had already begun.

‘Little Qing, Qiu Yue, Xiang Xiang..”

Lu Ming sensed Xie nianqing, Lu Xiangxiang, and the rest. He was relieved to find that they were fine. Then, Lu Ming waved his hand and countless divine stones flew out.

Although Lu Ming had a breakthrough in his realm, his energy had not caught up. He had to absorb a large amount of energy and transform into World Energy and domination energy.

Bang Bang Bang!

Countless G.o.dstones exploded.

Lu Ming did not care about wasting it now. What he wanted was to stabilize his cultivation as soon as possible and partic.i.p.ate in the big battle.

Hu hu hu…

Lu Ming absorbed it crazily. Endless divine Qi was swallowed into his body and transformed into the power of the world and the power of domination.

Lu Ming’s small world was expanding crazily.

not enough, far from enough. Speed up, speed up…

Lu Ming growled. In the end, he simply took out all the divine stones he had.

Piles of divine stones exploded and were devoured by Lu Ming.

The amount of energy Lu Ming needed to break through to the heavenly Emperor realm was too shocking.

The main thing was that a portion of the energy would be converted into ruler’s power, which consumed the most energy.

Before Lu Ming left, he had more than ten thousand chaos gems left. However, to La Ming now, these chaos gems were like a cup of water on a burning cart of firewood. They were not of much use to him. Therefore, Lu Ming had given them to Lu Xiangxiang, Ouyang Moli, and bubbles for use.

Lu Ming was now using the divine stone to cultivate.

Fortunately, he had obtained a large number of divine stones in the yellow Springs world.

Time continued to pa.s.s. Lu Ming’s aura grew stronger and more shocking. Of course, the number of divine. stones he devoured also increased.

The situation at the two world city battlefield had also entered a state of white heat.

Xie nianqing and Xie nianjun tried their best to stop sacred ancestor bloodheart, but the two’s faces turned

pale and blood kept flowing out of their mouths under her frenzied attacks.

killing heart, it’s too late. Let’s end this quickly!

The non-human sacred ancestor sent a voice transmission to sacred ancestor bloodheart anxiously.

He realized that Lu Ming was about to break through successfully.

d.a.m.n b*tches, I’ll make sure you never reincarnate. Explode, explode!

Sacred ancestor bloodheart roared and took out the blood-red bead. Endless blood-red light from his body entered the bead.

Buzzzzzz!

The blood-red bead trembled violently and burst out with a bright. blood-red light.

“Not good!”

Xie nianqing and Xie nianjun’s expressions changed.

BOOM!

Then, the blood-red bead exploded.

This was a divine weapon that surpa.s.sed the heaven Dao soldiers. When it exploded, the power was unbelievably great. Endless destructive power swept in all directions and struck the dark holy light cage.

In an instant, the dark holy light, cage exploded. Xie nianqing and Xie nianjun’s bodies were swept away by the force and were thrown back. They spat out blood and were severely injured.

“Dic!”

Saint ancestor bloodheart’s cycs were bloodshot as he pounced at Xic nianqing with endless killing intent. Buzzzzzz!

His terrifying, withered hand reached out to grab Xie nianqing.

Xie nianqing was severely injured and could not avoid this attack. If he was. .h.i.t, he would die.

At this critical moment, the s.p.a.ce in front of Xic nianging suddenly split open. A long spear flew out and stabbed at Saint ancestor bloodheart’s palm.

Thump!

The spear hit sacred ancestor bloodheart’s palm with a loud boom. The spear was knocked away, but sacred ancestor bloodheart was also forced back. A hole had appeared in his palm, and blood light, was wriggling

inside.

His eyes were filled with shock.

One had to know that he was burning his divine power and his fighting power had recovered to its peak. However, the spear had injured his palm.

His blood-red eyes looked forward.

In front of them, the void cracked open. A tall and slender young man in a black robe appeared behind Xie nianqing. He wrapped his arm around Xie nianqing’s slender waist and pulled him into his arms.

This young man was Lu Ming.

He had refined 90% of the G.o.dstones on him and finally stabilized his cultivation at the heavenly Emperor

realm.

Just then, Saint ancestor bloodheart had detonated his divine weapon and destroyed Xie nianging and Xie nianjun’s dark holy light cages. He rushed over without hesitation.

With his current cultivation, he could reach two world city in an instant from Dragon sovereign peak.

“Little Qing, are you okay?” Lu Ming asked with concern.

“Lu Ming, you’re finally here!”

Xie nianqing smiled.

“Little Qing, take this fruit of life!

A fruit of life appeared in Lu Ming’s hand and he fed it to Xie nianqing,

Xie nianqing took it and swallowed it in one gulp. His body glowed with a bright light.

“Life fruit, you still have…”

Sccing Lu Ming take out the fruit of life, Saint ancestor bloodheart’s eyes were filled with greed.

“Do you want it? I have a lot of them!”

Lu Ming looked at Saint ancestor bloodheart and waved his hand. Nine life fruits appeared in his hand and one llew toward Xie nianjun.

Xie nianjun caught the fruit of life without hesitation and swallowed it. Her injuries were healing rapidly.

“So many life fruits!”

Sacred ancestor bloodheart was shocked.
